snippet: According to the federal affidavit, Paul Ciancia asked a roommate for a ride to the Los Angeles Airport the morning that a security official was killed and two others wounded.
abstract: Federal prosecutors release affidavit revealing actions of Los Angeles Airport shooting suspect Paul Ciancia on morning leading up to fatal incident..
lead_paragraph: According to the federal affidavit, Paul Ciancia asked a roommate for a ride to the Los Angeles Airport the morning that a security official was killed and two others wounded.

headline.main: Shooting Suspect’s Steps Are Traced in Search for Clues to L.A. Airport Attack
headline.print_headline: Suspect’s Steps Are Traced In Search for Clues to Attack
